name: HYUNDAI GRAND I10 POPULAIRE
shortDescription: The all-new i10’s versatile boot space is among the best in its class. The lift-in height is 29mm lower than the previous model, making it easier to load luggage into the boot. The capacity expands from 252 litres to 1,046 with seats down.
fullDescription: The Hyundai Grand i10 has 1 Petrol Engine on offer. The Petrol engine is 1197 cc. It is available with the Manual transmission. Depending upon the variant and fuel type the Grand i10 has a mileage of 18.9 kmpl. The Grand i10 is a 5 seater Hatchback and has a length of 3765mm, width of 1660mm and a wheelbase of 2425mm.

name: SUZUKI CELERIO POPULAIRE
shortDescription: Que ce soit dans le siège du conducteur ou simplement en cours de route, sachez que vous êtes entre de bonnes mains avec la Celerio. Les scores des principales fonctionnalités de sécurité lors des crash-tests sont performants malgré sa taille.
